discussion.content:
Correct: AD

https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Cloud-on-AWS/services/com.vmware.vsphere.vmc-aws-manage-vms.doc/GUID-EE6F4E5A-3BEA-43DD-9990-DBEB0A280F3A.html

EVC can be enabled per VM and on Cluster
https://www.altaro.com/vmware/per-vm-evc/

Answer is A and D.
A. Enabling EVC on a Cluster.
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.7/com.vmware.vsphere.vcenterhost.doc/GUID-E3F5BAFE-EB14-408D-999A-590D4337D59C.html

D. Enabling EVC on a VM
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.7/com.vmware.vsphere.vm_admin.doc/GUID-A1C095EF-1B0F-4C10-9190-CFDD07193B2B.html

Not 100% sure this can be applied at the resource pool.

A,D

Correct: AD
This is applied at VM and Cluster level

questions.question_text:
An administrator runs multiple clusters spread across multiple vCenters. The administrator needs to be able to migrate any VM to any cluster.
On which two vCenter Server objects could the administrator configure EVC mode to fulfill this requirement? (Choose two.)

A user logs in to vCenter Server as an administrator and is unable to view Single Sign On Configuration.
Which vCenter Single Sign On group should the administrator belong to, to view Single Sign On Configuration?

discussion.content: C, because "Verify that the user you use to log in to the vCenter Server instance is a member of the SystemConfiguration.Administrators group in the vCenter Single Sign-On domain"

The correct answer is C. 

https://kb.vmware.com/s/article/2095342

questions.question_text:
A vSphere administrator notices performance issues with the vCenter Server Appliance. The CPU usage is over 70%.
Which two actions should the administrator take to investigate the performance issues? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Answer is A and C.

A. Use vimtop to identify which processes are using high CPU.
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.7/com.vmware.vsphere.vcsa.doc/GUID-E5E062B2-4195-4DA5-A85D-6E47B6A53D14.html

C. Check if vCenter Server is swapping.
https://kb.vmware.com/s/article/1009225

choices.E: Verify if all hosts are in a connected state.
choices.D: Use esxtop to identify which processes are using high CPU.
choices.A: Use vimtop to identify which processes are using high CPU.
choices.C: Check if vCenter Server is swapping.

questions.question_text:
A vSphere Administrator wants to convert a vCenter Server instance with an external Platform Services Controller to an embedded Platform Services Controller instance.
Which tool should be used to accomplish this?

comments.content: Correct. Answer is C. Convergence Utility.

discussion.content: A. All others are either not related or not secure.

choices.A: Specify remote IP subnet range in IP List.
choices.B: Use Allow connection from any IP address.

questions.question_text:
An administrator is using vSphere Web Client to configure the firewall to allow specific third-party application SSH access to an ESXi Host.
What is the most secure way to configure the firewall rule?
